prompts: Create a fiery insect Pokemon with vivid orange wings and a majestic body.
Imagine a butterfly-like creature with black and orange patterns, radiating warmth.
Design a Pokemon that embodies both fire and bug elements with a stunning color palette.
Show me a large, elegant Pokemon with beautiful wings and a fierce demeanor.
Generate an insectoid Pokemon that thrives in hot climates and dazzles with its colors.
Make a Pokemon with a striking orange body and intricate wing designs that resemble flames.
Give me a unique Pokemon that combines the beauty of nature and the power of fire.

distinctive_features: Black and orange body with a white underbelly
